items.headline: Nomura strategist warned the market selloff was coming . Here are the forces he says are taking stocks down.
items.summary_en: Leveraged ETFs, and a highly unbalanced market have been among the forces bubbling away at this market for weeks, a highly respected strategist notes.

items.headline: David Tepper is still betting big on China — and now this American appliance maker
items.summary_en: Famed investor David Tepper trimmed his stake in Chinese internet giant Alibaba but is still betting big on stocks in the country, a securities filing shows — and snapped up this struggling American company too.

items.headline: ‘I’m a big fan of DIY investing’: I’m 64 and moving to the U.S. I have $2.6 million, but no Social Security. Will I be OK?
